00035 // The maximum number of shortcuts associated with each wxCmd.
00036 #define wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS                     3

00061 class wxKeyBind
00062 {
00063 protected:
00064 
00066       int m_nFlags;
00067 
00069       int m_nKeyCode;
00070 
00071 public:
00072 
00073       wxKeyBind() {
00074             m_nKeyCode = m_nFlags = -1;
00075       }
00076 
00077       wxKeyBind(int flags, int keycode) {
00078             Set(flags, keycode);
00079       }
00080 
00081       wxKeyBind(const wxKeyBind &tocopy) {
00082             DeepCopy(tocopy);
00083       }
00084 
00085       wxKeyBind(const wxString &key) {
00086             m_nFlags = StringToKeyModifier(key);
00087             m_nKeyCode = StringToKeyCode(key.AfterLast('+').AfterLast('-'));
00088       }
00089 
00090       virtual void DeepCopy(const wxKeyBind &p) {
00091             m_nFlags = p.m_nFlags;
00092             m_nKeyCode = p.m_nKeyCode;
00093       }
00094 
00095       virtual ~wxKeyBind() {}
00096 
00097 
00098 
00099 public:
00100 
00102       void Set(int flags, int keycode) {
00103             m_nFlags = flags;
00104             m_nKeyCode = keycode;
00105       }
00106 
00111       void Set(const wxKeyBind &key) {
00112             m_nFlags = key.m_nFlags;
00113             m_nKeyCode = key.m_nKeyCode;
00114       }
00115 
00117       bool MatchKey(const wxKeyEvent &key) const;
00118 
00120       bool Match(const wxKeyBind &key) const {
00121             if (m_nFlags == key.m_nFlags && m_nKeyCode == key.m_nKeyCode)
00122                   return TRUE;
00123             return FALSE;
00124       }
00125 
00126 
00127 
00128       // Getters
00129       // ------------------
00130 
00131       int GetKeyCode() const {
00132             return m_nKeyCode;
00133       }
00134 
00135       int GetModifiers() const {
00136             return m_nFlags;
00137       }
00138 
00139       // Returns the string which describes this key combination.
00140       wxString GetStr() const {
00141             return KeyModifierToString(m_nFlags) + 
00142                   KeyCodeToString(m_nKeyCode);
00143       }
00144 
00145 
00146 public:           // static utilities
00147 
00148       static wxString NumpadKeyCodeToString(int keyCode);
00149       static wxString KeyCodeToString(int keyCode);
00150       static wxString KeyModifierToString(int keyModifier);
00151 
00152       static int StringToKeyCode(const wxString &keyName);
00153       static int StringToKeyModifier(const wxString &keyModifier);
00154 
00155       static int GetKeyModifier(wxKeyEvent &event);
00156       static wxString GetKeyStrokeString(wxKeyEvent &event);
00157 };

00179 class wxCmd
00180 {
00181       // wxKeyBinder must be allowed to call #Exec()
00182       friend class wxKeyBinder;
00183 
00184 protected:
00185 
00187       wxKeyBind m_keyShortcut[wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS];
00188       int m_nShortcuts;       
00189 
00191       wxString m_strName;
00192 
00194       wxString m_strDescription;
00195 
00197       int m_nId;
00198 
00199 protected:        // static
00200 
00203       typedef wxCmd *(*wxCmdCreationFnc)(int id);
00204 
00206       typedef struct {
00207             int type;
00208             wxCmdCreationFnc cmdCreateFnc;
00209       } wxCmdType;
00210 
00212       static wxCmdType m_arrCmdType[wxCMD_MAX_TYPES];
00213 
00215       static int m_nCmdTypes;
00216 
00217 
00218 public:           // static
00219 
00222       static wxCmd *CreateNew(int type, int id);
00223 
00225       static void AddCmdType(int type, wxCmdCreationFnc fnc);
00226 
00229       static wxCmdType *FindCmdType(int type);
00230 
00231 public:
00232 
00233       wxCmd(const wxKeyBind &first, int id, 
00234             const wxString &name = wxEmptyString,
00235             const wxString &desc = wxEmptyString) {
00236             m_strName = name;
00237             m_strDescription = desc;
00238             m_nShortcuts = 1;
00239             m_keyShortcut[0] = first;
00240             m_nId = id;
00241       }
00242 
00243       wxCmd(int id = wxID_INVALID, 
00244             const wxString &name = wxEmptyString,
00245             const wxString &desc = wxEmptyString) {
00246             m_strName = name;
00247             m_strDescription = desc;
00248             m_nId = id;
00249             m_nShortcuts = 0;
00250       }
00251 
00252       virtual void DeepCopy(const wxCmd *cmd) {
00253             m_strName = cmd->m_strName;
00254             m_strDescription = cmd->m_strDescription;
00255             m_nId = cmd->m_nId;
00256             m_nShortcuts = cmd->m_nShortcuts;
00257 
00258             for (int i=0; i < m_nShortcuts; i++)
00259                   m_keyShortcut[i].DeepCopy(cmd->m_keyShortcut[i]);
00260       }
00261 
00262       virtual wxCmd *Clone() const = 0;
00263 
00264       // Destructor
00265       virtual ~wxCmd() {}
00266 
00267 
00268 public:
00269 
00270       // Add/Remove functions
00271       // ----------------------------
00272 
00274       void AddShortcut(const wxKeyBind &key) {
00275             if (m_nShortcuts >= wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS) return;
00276             m_keyShortcut[m_nShortcuts++] = key;
00277             Update();
00278       }
00279 
00281       void AddShortcut(int flags, int keycode) {
00282             if (m_nShortcuts >= wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS) return;
00283             wxKeyBind key(flags, keycode);
00284             AddShortcut(key);
00285             // update is called by the previous call
00286       }
00287 
00290       void AddShortcut(const wxString &key) {
00291             if (m_nShortcuts >= wxCMD_MAX_SHORTCUTS) return;
00292             if (key.IsEmpty()) return;
00293             m_keyShortcut[m_nShortcuts++] = wxKeyBind(key);
00294             Update();
00295       }
00296 
00298       void RemoveShortcut(int n) {
00299             for (int i=n; i < m_nShortcuts; i++)      // shift array left
00300                   m_keyShortcut[i] = m_keyShortcut[i+1];
00301             m_nShortcuts--;
00302             Update();
00303       }
00304       
00306       void RemoveAllShortcuts() {
00307           m_nShortcuts=0;
00308           Update();
00309       }
00310 
00311 
00312 
00313       // Miscellaneous
00314       // ---------------------
00315 
00318       bool MatchKey(const wxKeyEvent &ev) const {
00319             for (int i=0; i < m_nShortcuts; i++)
00320                   if (m_keyShortcut[i].MatchKey(ev))
00321                         return TRUE;
00322             return FALSE;
00323       }
00324 
00331       bool IsBindTo(const wxKeyBind &key, int *n = NULL) const {
00332             for (int i=0; i < m_nShortcuts; i++) {
00333                   if (m_keyShortcut[i].Match(key)) {
00334                         if (n) *n = i;
00335                         return TRUE;
00336                   }
00337             }
00338             return FALSE;
00339       }
00340 
00345       bool Save(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString, bool bCleanOld = FALSE) const;
00346 
00350       bool Load(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString);
00351 
00352 
00353 
00354 
00355       // Getters
00356       // ---------------------
00357 
00358       wxKeyBind *GetShortcut(int n)                    { return &m_keyShortcut[n]; }
00359       const wxKeyBind *GetShortcut(int n) const  { return &m_keyShortcut[n]; }
00360 
00361       wxAcceleratorEntry GetAccelerator(int n) const {
00362             return wxAcceleratorEntry(GetShortcut(n)->GetModifiers(),
00363                   GetShortcut(n)->GetKeyCode(), m_nId);
00364       }
00365 
00366       int GetId() const {
00367             return m_nId;
00368       }
00369 
00370       int GetShortcutCount() const {
00371             return m_nShortcuts;
00372       }
00373 
00374       wxString GetDescription() const {
00375             return m_strDescription;
00376       }
00377 
00378       wxString GetName() const {
00379             return m_strName;
00380       }
00381 
00382       wxArrayString GetShortcutsList() const {
00383             wxArrayString arr;
00384             for (int i=0; i < m_nShortcuts; i++)
00385                   arr.Add(m_keyShortcut[i].GetStr());
00386             return arr;
00387       }
00388 
00390       virtual int GetType() const = 0;
00391 
00392 
00393 protected:
00394 
00397       virtual void Update() {}
00398 
00404       virtual void Exec(wxObject *obj, wxEvtHandler *client) = 0;
00405 };

00414 class wxCmdArray
00415 {
00416       wxArrayPtrVoid m_arr;
00417 
00418 public:
00419       wxCmdArray() {}
00420       wxCmdArray(const wxCmdArray &tocopy) { DeepCopy(tocopy); }
00421       virtual ~wxCmdArray() { Clear(); }
00422 
00423       void DeepCopy(const wxCmdArray &arr) {
00424             Clear();
00425             for (int i=0; i < arr.GetCount(); i++)
00426                   Add(arr.Item(i)->Clone());
00427       }
00428 
00429       wxCmdArray &operator=(const wxCmdArray &tocopy) {
00430             DeepCopy(tocopy);
00431             return *this;
00432       }
00433 
00434       void Add(wxCmd *p)                  { m_arr.Add(p); }
00435       void Remove(int n);
00436       void Clear();
00437 
00438       int GetCount() const          { return m_arr.GetCount(); }
00439       wxCmd *Item(int n) const      { return (wxCmd *)m_arr.Item(n); }
00440 };

00498 
00499 // Define the wxADD_KEYBINDER_SUPPORT: you should use it inside a protected
00500 // block of the windows which want to use the wxKeyBinder facilities
00501 #ifdef __WXMSW__
00502 
00503       // This is a virtual function used in wxMSW which can be used to allow
00504       // or disable the message preprocessing and thus the preprocessing of
00505       // keyshortcuts; to add keybinder support, the preprocessing must be
00506       // disabled: wxKeyBinder will care of checking the keypresses for
00507       // eventual hotkeys...
00508       #define wxADD_KEYBINDER_SUPPORT()                                                         \
00509             virtual bool MSWShouldPreProcessMessage(WXMSG*) { return FALSE; }
00510 #else
00511 
00512       // the other ports doesn't use MSWShouldPreProcessMessage...
00513       #define wxADD_KEYBINDER_SUPPORT()               /* expand to nothing */
00514 
00515 #endif
00516

00578 class wxKeyBinder : public wxObject
00579 {
00580 protected:
00581 
00583       wxCmdArray m_arrCmd;
00584 
00592       //wxArrayPtrVoid m_arrAttachedWnd;
00593       //wxWindowList m_lstAttachedWnd;          // I don't like wxList...
00594 
00596       wxArrayPtrVoid m_arrHandlers;
00597 
00598 protected:
00599 
00600 
00602       int FindCmd(int id) const {
00603             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrCmd.GetCount(); i++)
00604                   if (id == m_arrCmd.Item(i)->GetId())
00605                         return i;
00606             return -1;
00607       }
00608 
00611       int FindCmdBindTo(const wxKeyBind &key, int *n = NULL) const {
00612             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrCmd.GetCount(); i++)
00613                   if (m_arrCmd.Item(i)->IsBindTo(key, n))
00614                         return i;
00615             return -1;
00616       }
00617 
00620       int FindMatchingCmd(const wxKeyEvent &key) const {
00621             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrCmd.GetCount(); i++)
00622                   if (m_arrCmd.Item(i)->MatchKey(key))
00623                         return i;
00624             return -1;
00625       }
00626 
00627 
00628 public:
00629 
00630       wxKeyBinder() {}
00631       wxKeyBinder(const wxKeyBinder &tocopy) { DeepCopy(tocopy); }
00632       virtual ~wxKeyBinder() { DetachAll(); }
00633 
00634 
00635 
00636 public:           // miscellaneous
00637 
00639       void OnChar(wxKeyEvent &event, wxEvtHandler *next);   
00640 
00642       void DeepCopy(const wxKeyBinder &p) {
00643             m_arrCmd.DeepCopy(p.m_arrCmd);
00644             
00645             // NEVER COPY THE ARRAY OF THE ATTACHED WINDOWs:
00646             // WE ARE NOT ATTACHED TO THE WINDOWS OF THE GIVEN BINDER !!
00647             // m_arrAttachedWnd = p->m_arrAttachedWnd;
00648       }
00649 
00650       wxKeyBinder &operator=(const wxKeyBinder &tocopy) {
00651             DeepCopy(tocopy);
00652             return *this;
00653       }
00654 
00656       void Reset() {
00657             m_arrCmd.Clear();
00658       }
00659 
00661       void UpdateCmd() {
00662             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrCmd.GetCount(); i++)
00663                   m_arrCmd.Item(i)->Update();
00664       }
00665 
00668       void Enable(bool bEnable = TRUE) {
00669             for (int i=0; i < (int)m_arrHandlers.GetCount(); i++)
00670                   ((wxBinderEvtHandler*)m_arrHandlers.Item(i))->SetEvtHandlerEnabled(bEnable);
00671       }
00672 
00674       void Attach(wxWindow *p);
00675 
00678       void AttachRecursively(wxWindow *p);
00679 
00681       void Detach(wxWindow *p);
00682 
00684       void DetachAll();
00685 
00687       bool IsAttachedTo(wxWindow *p) const
00688             { return FindHandlerIdxFor(p) != wxNOT_FOUND; }
00689 
00691       int FindHandlerIdxFor(wxWindow *p) const;
00692 
00694       wxBinderEvtHandler *FindHandlerFor(wxWindow *p) const;
00695 
00698       void ImportMenuBarCmd(wxMenuBar *p);
00699 
00704       bool Save(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString, bool bCleanOld = FALSE) const;
00705 
00707       bool Load(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString);
00708 
00709 
00710 
00711       // Add functions
00712       // -------------------
00713 
00714       void AddCmd(wxCmd *p) {
00715             m_arrCmd.Add(p);
00716       }
00717 
00718       void AddShortcut(int id, const wxString &key) {
00719             wxCmd *p = GetCmd(id);
00720             if (p) p->AddShortcut(key);
00721       }
00722 
00723       void AddShortcut(int id, const wxKeyBind &key) {
00724             wxCmd *p = GetCmd(id);
00725             if (p) p->AddShortcut(key);
00726       }
00727 
00728 
00729 
00730       // Getters
00731       // -------------------
00732 
00733       int GetCmdCount() const {
00734             return m_arrCmd.GetCount();
00735       }
00736 
00737       int GetAttachedWndCount() const {
00738             return m_arrHandlers.GetCount();
00739       }     
00740 
00741       wxWindow *GetWindow(int n) const {
00742             return ((wxBinderEvtHandler*)m_arrHandlers.Item(n))->GetTargetWnd();
00743       }
00744 
00745       wxCmd *GetMatchingCmd(const wxKeyEvent &key) const {
00746             int i = FindMatchingCmd(key);
00747             if (i != -1)
00748                   return m_arrCmd.Item(i);
00749             return NULL;
00750       }
00751 
00752       wxCmd *GetCmd(int id) const {
00753             int i = FindCmd(id);
00754             if (i != -1)
00755                   return m_arrCmd.Item(i);
00756             return NULL;
00757       }
00758 
00759       wxCmd *GetCmdBindTo(const wxString &key, int *n = NULL) const {
00760             int i = FindCmdBindTo(wxKeyBind(key), n);
00761             if (i != -1)
00762                   return m_arrCmd.Item(i);
00763             return NULL;
00764       }
00765 
00766       wxKeyBind *GetShortcut(int id, int n) const {
00767             wxCmd *p = GetCmd(id);
00768             if (p) return p->GetShortcut(n);
00769             return NULL;
00770       }
00771 
00772       wxString GetShortcutStr(int id, int n) const {
00773             wxKeyBind *p = GetShortcut(id, n);
00774             if (p) return p->GetStr();
00775             return wxEmptyString;
00776       }
00777 
00778       wxArrayString GetShortcutsList(int id) const {
00779             wxCmd *p = GetCmd(id);
00780             if (p) return p->GetShortcutsList();
00781             return wxArrayString();
00782       }
00783 
00784       wxArrayPtrVoid *GetHandlersArr()          { return &m_arrHandlers; }    
00785 
00786       wxCmdArray *GetArray()                          { return &m_arrCmd;     }
00787       const wxCmdArray *GetArray() const        { return &m_arrCmd; }
00788 
00789 
00790 private:
00791       DECLARE_CLASS(wxKeyBinder)    
00792 };

00871 class wxKeyProfileArray
00872 {
00876       wxArrayPtrVoid m_arr;
00877 
00879       int m_nSelected;
00880 
00881 public:
00882       wxKeyProfileArray() { m_nSelected=-1; }
00883       wxKeyProfileArray(const wxKeyProfileArray &tocopy) { DeepCopy(tocopy); }
00884       virtual ~wxKeyProfileArray() { Cleanup(); }
00885       
00886       
00891       
00892       int GetCount() const                { return m_arr.GetCount(); }
00893       int GetSelProfileIdx() const  { return m_nSelected; }
00894       wxKeyProfile *Item(int n)           { return (wxKeyProfile*)m_arr.Item(n); }
00895       wxKeyProfile *GetSelProfile() { wxASSERT(m_nSelected >= 0 && m_nSelected < GetCount()); return Item(m_nSelected); }
00896       void Add(wxKeyProfile *p)           { m_arr.Add(p); }
00897       void Clear()                              { m_arr.Clear(); }
00898       void Remove(wxKeyProfile *p)  { m_arr.Remove(p); }
00899       void SetSelProfile(int n)           { wxASSERT(n < GetCount()); m_nSelected = n; }
00900       bool IsEmpty() const                { return m_arr.IsEmpty(); }
00901 
00902       const wxKeyProfile *Item(int n) const                 { return (wxKeyProfile*)m_arr.Item(n); }
00903       const wxKeyProfile *GetSelProfile() const       { return Item(m_nSelected); }
00904       void RemoveAt(size_t i, size_t count = 1)       { m_arr.RemoveAt(i, count); }
00905       void Insert(wxKeyProfile *p, int n)                   { m_arr.Insert(p, n); }
00906       
00908       
00909 
00911       void DeepCopy(const wxKeyProfileArray &p) {
00912             Cleanup();
00913             for (int i=0; i < p.GetCount(); i++)
00914                   Add(new wxKeyProfile(*p.Item(i)));
00915             m_nSelected = p.m_nSelected;
00916       }
00917 
00918       wxKeyProfileArray &operator=(const wxKeyProfileArray &tocopy) {
00919             DeepCopy(tocopy);
00920             return *this;
00921       }
00922       
00926       void Cleanup() {
00927             for (int i=0; i < GetCount(); i++)
00928                   delete Item(i);
00929             Clear();
00930       }
00931 
00936       void AttachAllTo(wxWindow *w) {
00937             for (int i=0; i<GetCount(); i++)
00938                   Item(i)->Attach(w);
00939       }
00940 
00942       void EnableAll(bool bEnable = TRUE) {
00943             for (int i=0; i<GetCount(); i++)
00944                   Item(i)->Enable(bEnable);
00945       }
00946 
00948       void DetachAllFrom(wxWindow *w) {
00949             for (int i=0; i<GetCount(); i++)
00950                   Item(i)->Detach(w);
00951       }
00952 
00954       void DetachAll() {
00955             for (int i=0; i<GetCount(); i++)
00956                   Item(i)->DetachAll();
00957       }
00958       
00960       void UpdateAllCmd() {
00961             for (int i=0; i<GetCount(); i++)
00962                   Item(i)->UpdateCmd();
00963       }
00964 
00969       bool Save(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString, bool bCleanOld = FALSE) const;
00970       
00974       bool Load(wxConfigBase *p, const wxString &key = wxEmptyString);
00975 };

01204             { int n=GetSelProfileIdx(); return (n >= 0 ? GetProfile(n) : NULL); }

01214             { wxASSERT(m_pKeyProfiles); return m_nCurrentProf; }
